explains: n. （组织的）层；[地质] 地层；社会阶层
wordGroup: stratum corneum 角质层；角层；角化层

sentences.en: It was an enormous task that affected every stratum of society.
sentences.cn: 这是一项影响到社会各阶层的重大任务。

sentences.en: Tramps are from the lowest stratum of society.
sentences.cn: 流浪汉来自社会最下层。

sentences.en: Mossy fibres terminate in the stratum lucidum of area CA3.
sentences.cn: 苔藓纤维终止于 CA3 区透明层。
